    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78662</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transferring momentum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragendes Momentum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élan de transfert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Momentum transferindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quantità di moto di trasferimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά της ορμής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ímpetu de transferencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how a club transfers momentum to a golf ball. This can be used as an exercise to calculate changes in momentum of objects and the resulting speed of the object.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">golf ball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">golf club</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie eine Verein Momentum 
auf eine Golfkugel überträgt. Dieses kann als Übung verwendet
werden, um Impulsänderungen der Nachrichten und die resultierende 
Geschwindigkeit der Nachricht zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment un club 
transfère l'élan à une boule de golf. Ceci peut être 
employé comme exercice pour calculer des changements le des moments 
des objets et la vitesse résultante de l'objet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como um clube 
transfere o momentum a uma esfera de golf. Isto pode ser usado 
como um exercício calcular mudanças no momentum dos objetos e na 
velocidade resultante do objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come un randello 
trasferisce la quantità di moto ad una sfera di golf. Ciò può
essere usata come esercitazione per calcolare i cambiamenti il dei 
momenti degli oggetti e la velocità risultante dell'oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς μια λέσχη 
μεταφέρει την ορμή σε μια σφαίρα γκολφ. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση για να υπολογίσει τις αλλαγές στην ορμή 
των αντικειμένων και την προκύπτουσα ταχύτητα του αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo un club 
transfiere ímpetu a una pelota de golf. Esto se puede utilizar 
como ejercicio para calcular cambios en el ímpetu de objetos y la 
velocidad que resulta del objeto.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
